forks.title: Liquid Chromatography High-Resolution Mass Spectrometry  metabolomics analysis: from preparation to injection

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"cfokm","text":"Recommandations: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qjo3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8psi3","text":"Perform several blank injections at the start of analysis to check for contamination;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"croti","text":"Perform two injections of \"Mix metabo 2\" at the beginning and end of the sequence;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"717ok","text":"Check that there has been no drift in retention times, that intensity is good and that mass accuracy is correct;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pr9l","text":"Injection of 6 QC at start of sequence;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cstun","text":"Injection of a QC every 5 samples;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0t32","text":"Inject diluted QC (1/2, by 4 and by 8) and check that the molecules follow this decrease in concentration.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jjs8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
